DOC.brief_summary: This trial compare efficacy tolerability 20 Hz vs. 1 Hz vs. sham repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation target dorsomedial prefrontal cortex , deliver twice daily 15 day , patient diagnosis major depressive disorder . The trial include structural functional MRI , EEG , behavioral measure obtain , , treatment .
DOC.brief_title: High-frequency vs. Low-frequency vs. Sham DMPFC-rTMS Major Depression
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( Patient ) : Voluntary competent consent treatment MINI confirm diagnosis MDD Outpatient Between age 1865 Failed achieve clinical response least one pharmacotherapy behavioral treatment current episode . Have increase initiation psychotropic medication last 4 week prior screen Must adhere study assessment intervention schedule . Pass TMS Safety Screening Questionnaire . Exclusion Criteria ( Patient ) : Have concomitant major unstable medical illness , cardiac pacemaker implant medical pump Have active suicidal intent Are pregnant Have lifetime MINI diagnosis bipolar I II disorder , schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder , schizophreniform , delusional disorder , current psychotic symptom MINI diagnosis obsessivecompulsive disorder , posttraumatic stress disorder ( current within last year ) , anxiety disorder ( generalize anxiety disorder , social anxiety disorder , panic disorder ) , dysthymia assess study investigator primary causing great impairment MDD Have receive rTMS previous indication due potential compromise subject blinding .
